testcase.name: Tc-03: Verification of Adactin Login
testcase.system-out: Given User wants to verify whether the login page appears once the aactin application is launched.passed When User wants to give valid username and password using DataTable with header Two-D, and click on the login button.passed Then User wants to verify whether the search hotel page appear or not.......passed
